typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Building_sqnr as integer,
		Building_ID as integer,
		Load_date_timestamp as timestamp,
		Record_source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> hubBuilding
source(output(
		Building_sqnr as integer,
		Load_date_timestamp as timestamp,
		End_date_timestamp as timestamp,
		Record_source as string,
		Name as string,
		Owner as string,
		Function_ as string,
		Construction_year as integer,
		Slanting_roof_height as double,
		Heat_effect as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> satBuilding
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> HubCategory
hubBuilding, satBuilding lookup(hubBuilding@Building_sqnr == satBuilding@Building_sqnr,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupBuildingSqNr
LookupBuildingSqNr sink(input(
		Building_sqnr as integer,
		Name as string,
		Owner as string,
		Function as string,
		Construction_year as integer,
		Heat_effect as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Building_sqnr = hubBuilding@Building_sqnr,
		Name,
		Owner,
		Function = Function_,
		Construction_year,
		Heat_effect
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SinkBuildingDemension
